page.title: 15Fighting Fit.
page.content: We went on the 3rd July 1985 to survey holidaymakers and residents about health and fitness. We found every person said that keeping fit was very important. About 90% said they did stretching and bending exercises but only 50% they ate any health foods. Many of the older people said that they used to play sports when they were younger such as swimming, tennis and football. Some people said "We stopped keeping fit because we got married, had kids and therefore did not have time." Finally, many people believe that it was sensible to keep fit but one should be careful about overdoing it.
